     Orchestra thought for a moment.

     "...........Y....=
Yes," he said, part reluctantly.

  BlackNightmare::

  Blacknigh=
tmare followed Orchestra; when she was close to him, she moved her hands to=
wards his shoulders and put then there and with her sweetest tone said "My =
love, all those ideas are for your protection... When Alliance capture a bo=
t they do two things: kill the intruder or reprograme him. But I can't help=
 you if you don't trust me and In the things that I have to do... Do you tr=
ust me?"

ct: Re: Musical Bots


    ::Orchestra::

         Orchestra let go of Blac=
knightmare, and started pacing across the room
    with his pointer finger =
and thumb sort of pinching his chin.

          "I see......So, what ideas =
do you have in mind?  Every little bit
    counts, so don't hold back any p=
iece of your ideas......" Orchestra said.
